content.c_answer2: The Book of Mormon's Broadway cast recording broke records when it was released in 2011. It became the fastest\-selling cast album in iTunes history, and after winning multiple Tony Awards it made it to the Top 5 of the Billboard 200. The most recognisable songs from the show are "I Believe", "Hello", "All\-American Prophet", "You and Me (But Mostly Me)" and "Turn It Off".
content.name: What are the best-known songs in The Book of Mormon?
content.question: What are the best-known songs in The Book of Mormon?
